snippet: The memorial will be held in the World Cup soccer stadium in Soweto, South Africa, where Nelson Mandela made his last public appearance in 2010.
abstract: Heads of state from around the world are heading to South Africa to take part in memorial to Nelson Mandela, presenting that country's government with a security test, logistical challenge and protocol quiz all rolled into one.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS KULISH and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Nicholas Kulish reported from Johannesburg, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: The memorial will be held in the World Cup soccer stadium in Soweto, South Africa, where Nelson Mandela made his last public appearance in 2010.

headline.main: Scores of Leaders Heading to South Africa for Service
headline.print_headline: Scores of Leaders Heading To South Africa for Service
